name: √ertex
description:
GGJ 2023 Entry - Roots

A fast paced arena survival making use of the root cause of the player's death, made in 48 hours for the GGJ. Enjoy!

---------------------------------------------------------

How to Play:  [FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING]

Embody the root cause of your death!

Vertex uses a rock paper scissors style combat system. To change shape, sacrifice a life by hitting a red entity. To gain a life, hit a green entity and increase your score. Consecutive green hits within a short period will increase your streak, and consequently your points!
